title: Received an icon from Riot?
body:
I've received an icon from riot that looks like "4 honoring icons at the end of the game.

Why did i get this??

replies.body: Because you had 10 of each of the old types of honor! We recently started rewarding players who had gained a lot of honor under the old system, so be sure to look over all the details on [**this faq**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/old-honor-rewards)!
